short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform the look of your Gmail inbox with different minimalist themes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Not to be confused with G Fuel the energy drink, G-Fill extenson is quite the booster for your Gmail experience! Say goodbye to those eye-searing, bright distractions and hello to zen-like minimalism. G-Fill's sleek and stylish themes strip away the chaos, leaving you with nothing but focus and clarity. Get ready to fall head over heels for your new Gmail vibe with G-Fill. Get G-Fill today! More themes coming soon!

Feeling wholesome? Support G-Fill here:
https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=TMT8A9TX5SYJG

**INSTRUCTIONS**
1. Install the G-Fill chrome extension.
2. Log in to your Gmail account.
3. Click settings, then select a theme that has a background image.
4. Click the G-Fill icon to open the extension page.
5. Select a theme and click 'Activate'.
6. Reload your Gmail page now and your chosen theme should be applied. Enjoy ;)
